snippet.title: oom - Playdate gameplay + impressions
snippet.description:
► Subscribe: http://ow.ly/Ozgq50IWo4R
► Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HelloPlaydate
► My Other Channel: http://goo.gl/6GdDjU
--
Destination Playdate is a channel dedicated to coverage of the handheld gaming console from Panic Inc. Hosted by Attack Slug, with 10 years of YouTube experience and 30+ years gaming knowledge.
--
available here: https://play.date/games/oom/
--
Oom is a rhythmic dungeon crawler where player simultaneously moves and shoots on the beat and controls the direction of the character with the crank. It's an unusual take on a rhythm game where decisive action is made in-between the beats.

..but in the end it's all about partnership
